verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they bring <S%H3947><s%> to you pure <S%H2134><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> beaten <S%H3795><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> to cause the lamps <S%H5216><s%> to burn <S%H5927><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

Without <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> shall Aaron <S%H175><s%> order <S%H6186><s%> it from the evening <S%H6153><s%> to the morning <S%H1242><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> continually: <S%H8548><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations. <S%H1755><s%>
He shall order <S%H6186><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> on the pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick <S%H4501><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and bake <S%H644><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> thereof: two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals shall be in one <S%H259><s%> cake. <S%H2471><s%>

And you shall set <S%H7760><s%> them in two <S%H8147><s%> rows, <S%H4634><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> on a row, <S%H4635><s%> on the pure <S%H2889><s%> table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on each row, <S%H4635><s%> that it may be on the bread <S%H3899><s%> for a memorial, <S%H234><s%> even an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Every sabbath <S%H7676><s%> he shall set it in order <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> being taken from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And it shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons'; <S%H1121><s%> and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to him of the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute. <S%H2706><s%>

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of an Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> whose father <S%H1121><s%> <S%H376><s%> was an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and this son <S%H1121><s%> of the Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman and a man <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3481><s%> strove <S%H5327><s%> together in the camp; <S%H4264><s%>

And the Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman's <S%H802><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> blasphemed <S%H5344><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, and cursed. <S%H7043><s%> And they brought <S%H935><s%> him to Moses: <S%H4872><s%> (and his mother's <S%H517><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Shelomith, <S%H8019><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Dibri, <S%H1704><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan: <S%H1835><s%>)
And they put <S%H3240><s%> him in ward, <S%H4929><s%> that the mind <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> might be showed <S%H6567><s%> them.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> him that has cursed <S%H7043><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> that heard <S%H8085><s%> him lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> stone <S%H7275><s%> him.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Whoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> curses <S%H7043><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his sin. <S%H2399><s%>

And he that blasphemes <S%H5344><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he shall surely be put to death, <S%H4191><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall certainly stone <S%H7275><s%> him: as well the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> as he that is born <S%H249><s%> in the land, <S%H249><s%> when he blasphemes <S%H5344><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>
And he that kills <S%H5221><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>
And he that kills <S%H5221><s%> a beast <S%H5315><s%> <S%H929><s%> shall make it good; <S%H7999><s%> beast <S%H5315><s%> for beast. <S%H5315><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> cause <S%H5414><s%> a blemish <S%H3971><s%> in his neighbor; <S%H5997><s%> as he has done, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to him;

Breach <S%H7667><s%> for breach, <S%H7667><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye, <S%H5869><s%> tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth: <S%H8127><s%> as he has caused <S%H5414><s%> a blemish <S%H3971><s%> in a man, <S%H120><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall it be done <S%H5414><s%> to him again.
And he that kills <S%H5221><s%> a beast, <S%H929><s%> he shall restore <S%H7999><s%> it: and he that kills <S%H5221><s%> a man, <S%H120><s%> he shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

You shall have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> of law, <S%H4941><s%> as well for the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> as for one of your own <S%H249><s%> country: <S%H249><s%> for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they should bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> him that had cursed <S%H7043><s%> out of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones. <S%H68><s%> And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
